excerpt: "As the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) continues to advance at an unprecedented pace, one particular subset has been gaining significant traction – Generative AI. Gartner explains that Generative AI isn’t just a technology or a business case — it is a key part of a society in which people and machines work together."
